game.name: AxeSlinger
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: AxeSlinger is a fast, heavy-metal roguelite FPS where you shred through demon-infested dimensions using guitar-weapons. Fight hordes, rack up insane combos, unlock powers, and battle colossal bosses as the last Death Angel of Shred on your path to reclaim your throne from the Battle Worm.
game.shortDescriptionEn: AxeSlinger is a fast, heavy-metal roguelite FPS where you shred through demon-infested dimensions using guitar-weapons. Fight hordes, rack up insane combos, unlock powers, and battle colossal bosses as the last Death Angel of Shred on your path to reclaim your throne from the Battle Worm.
